waligama pradeshaye sancharaka kshethrey athi wi thibena gatalu handunagena eewata piliyam yedima wenuwan athikala pradeshiya kamituwa wyapruthi kalamanakarana, tharuna katayuthu saha dakshina sanwardhana amathya sagala rathnayaka mahathage pradhanathwayen waligama pradeshiya lekam karyala parishraye di heta ( 26) sawasa 05.00 ta pawathwe.

narakama aanduwe sita pahalata sirima aanduwa (narakama )- awurudu 2k chande kal damima ,hal polu miris polu, rajya daradadu nithi ha pathalaya,sanwardhana dakmak nowima,nithiya awabhawithaya,horakama premadasa aanduwa -pathalaya,nasthiya ,rajya mardhanaya,nithiya awabhawithaya,horakama je aar aanduwa -80 juli warjanaya, 83 juli kalabala awasthawe hasirima, pathalaya,rajya mardhanaya,horakama mahinda aanduwa - rajya mardhanaya,gnyathi sangrahaya , nasthiya ,horakama aadi washayenuyi.

agramathya ranil wikramasinha, kathanayaka karu jayasuriya, hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga athuluwa mathi amathiwarun rashiyak ekwa siti mema uthsawaya sandaha puwathpath danwim, samaru kasi nikuth kirima, muddara nikuth kirima, kofi tebal poth sakasima, wideshiya thanapathiwarun ha nagaradhipathiwarunta awashya hotal gasthu, bima, guwan tikatpath ,gaman wiyadam, nila lanchana sakasima, dijital oralosuwak sakasima sandaha pradhana washayen wiyadam dara athi bawa ehi sandahanya.

jayawardhana hitapu janadhipathi waraya 1977 wasare balayata path wu wigasama siya wyawastha sanshodhanaya ratata idiripath kaleya.1966 wasare di ohu mema adahasa prathama warata idiripath kota aththe ema wasare desambar masa 14 di widyabhiwardhana sangam shalawe pawathi raswimakadiya.me ehidi ohu pala kala adahasayi.
me pituwa anthimata sakasuwe 4 okthobar 2016 dina di, 05:21 welawehidiya.
godak aayo oya kupan kad wikunanawa kalu kadawalata kunu kolleta.
ee siyallatama wada meya jathika aarakshawata pa්rabala tharjanayaki.
murali sithana widiyata hithannata 100% k parishuddha samahara sinhala bauddhayan pawa sudanam natha.
